export const authAPI={// Login
login:credentials=>api.post('/auth/login',credentials),// Google OAuth
googleVerify:credential=>api.post('/auth/google/verify',{credential}),// Logout

getAll:params=>api.get('/users',{params}),// Get user by ID

update:(id,data)=>api.put("/users/".concat(id),data),// Delete user

create:data=>api.post('/attendance',data),// Update attendance record
update:(id,data)=>api.put("/attendance/".concat(id),data),// Delete attendance record
delete:id=>api.delete("/attendance/".concat(id)),// Get attendance for specific employee
getByEmployee:(employeeId,params)=>api.get("/attendance/employee/".concat(employeeId),{params}),// Get daily attendance summary
getDailySummary:date=>api.get("/attendance/daily/".concat(date)),// Get monthly attendance report
